org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport
Class Connection

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg.transport.Connection
Direct Known Subclasses:
HttpConnection, TCPConnection, TCPNotificationListenConnection
public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object

Connection represents a connection to the client.

Author:
Dijana Micijevic, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2003/04, Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06

          Flag which states if there is a pending close request on the connection.

Notifies all added listeners that there is a new message.

Parameters:

close

public abstract void close()
Closes the connection

send

public abstract void send(java.lang.String outMessage)
Sends a message to the specified receiver.

Parameters:
outMessage - the message to send.

requestClose

public void requestClose()
Requests for closing of the connection. It means that the connection has to close itself after having sent the next message (which should then be the "last" message, e.g. an ACK of a goodbye command).

getReceiverHandshake

public ReceiverHandshakeMessage getReceiverHandshake()
Returns:
Returns the receiverHandshake.

senderHandshake - The senderHandshake to set.

getSenderMessageFormat

public MessageFormat getSenderMessageFormat()
Returns format of the sender message

Returns:
format of the message which arrived or null if not defined.

getReceiverMessageFormat

public MessageFormat getReceiverMessageFormat()
Gets the format of message sent back to the receiver

Returns:
format of the message which the receiver expects or null if not defined.

isAckNakEnabled

public boolean isAckNakEnabled()
Returns:
Returns the ackNakEnabled or false if handshake is not defined.

handleClient

public abstract void handleClient()
Handles a client on that connection.
